io.artframework.impl

Class DefaultActionContext<TTarget>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.artframework.AbstractScoped
      • io.artframework.AbstractArtObjectContext<Action<TTarget>>
        • io.artframework.impl.DefaultActionContext<TTarget>
  • Type Parameters:
    TTarget - target type of the action
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action<TTarget>, ActionContext<TTarget>, ActionHolder, ArtObject, ArtObjectContext<Action<TTarget>>, Context, FutureTargetResultCreator, RequirementHolder, ResultCreator, Scoped, TargetHolder

    public final class DefaultActionContext<TTarget>
extends AbstractArtObjectContext<Action<TTarget>>
implements ActionContext<TTarget>, FutureTargetResultCreator
    The action context is created for every unique Action configuration. It holds all relevant information to execute the action and tracks the dependencies.

      • execute

        public FutureResult execute(Target<TTarget> target,
                            ExecutionContext<ActionContext<TTarget>> context)
        Description copied from interface: Action
        Called when the action is executed. The action should handle the pure execution and no filtering. All filtering is done beforehand and by the means of attached Requirements. Use the @ConfigOption annotation on fields of this class to provide configuration options for users of this action.

        Make sure to annotate this Action with a @ART and optionally provide a config class and implement Configurable.

        Specified by:
        execute in interface Action<TTarget>
        Specified by:
        execute in interface ActionContext<TTarget>
        Parameters:
        target - the target of this action
        context - context of this action. Use the ExecutionContext to retrieve the config and a lot of additional information about the execution.
        Returns:
        the result of the action execution. Use the ResultCreator.success(String...) and ResultCreator.failure(String...) methods to create the result.

      • testExecutedOnce

        public FutureResult testExecutedOnce(Target<TTarget> target)
        Checks if the DefaultActionContext has the execute_once option and already executed once for the Target.
        Parameters:
        target - target to check
        Returns:
        true if action was already executed and should only execute once

      • testCooldown

        public FutureResult testCooldown(Target<TTarget> target)
        Checks if the action is on cooldown for the given Target. Will always return false if no cooldown is defined (set to zero).
        Parameters:
        target - target to check
        Returns:
        a successful result if the action is not on cooldown a failure otherwise
